Keyboard ShortcutsÂ¶

Key Function
i Insert Node
d Delete Node
p Pinch Node^
> Next Layer
< Previous Layer
z Zoom
a Show All (1:1 aspect)
shift+p Pan

^Left click selects node to pinch, now change layer and select the node to pinch onto.
